data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Diego Montano Robles awards Queretaro a goal kick.
In the minute 9, America awarded a free kick in their own half.
Important block from the America defence as Kevin Ramirez fires in a strike for Queretaro.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Santiago de Queretaro.
In the minute 11, Queretaro have a goal kick.
Diego Montano Robles awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick for America in the half of Queretaro.
In the minute 13, America have been awarded a corner by Diego Montano Robles.
America are in shooting range from this free kick.
Diego Montano Robles signals a free kick to Queretaro in their own half.
In the minute 15, Richard Sanchez (America) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Throw-in for America at Estadio La Corregidora.
Can Queretaro get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in America's half?
In the minute 17, Free kick for America in their own half.
In Santiago de Queretaro a free kick has been awarded the away team.
America surge into the attack at Estadio La Corregidora but Federico Vinasâ€™s header is off-target.
In the minute 18, Goal kick for Queretaro at Estadio La Corregidora.
Ball goes out of play for a America goal kick.
Diego Montano Robles signals a free kick to America in their own half.
In the minute 20, Angel Sepulveda (Queretaro) has received a yellow card from Diego Montano Robles.
Throw-in high up the field for Queretaro in Santiago de Queretaro.
Queretaro's Kevin Ramirez gets in a shot on goal at Estadio La Corregidora. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 22, Corner awarded to Queretaro.
Queretaro attack but Hugo Silveira's header doesn't find the target.
Diego Montano Robles awards America a goal kick.
In the minute 24, Queretaro advance rapidly upfield but Diego Montano Robles blows for offside.
Throw-in for Queretaro in their own half.
Ball safe as America is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 26, America awarded a throw-in in their own half.
America have been awarded a corner by Diego Montano Robles.
Free kick Queretaro.
In the minute 28, America have a goal kick.
Diego Montano Robles signals a free kick to America.
In Santiago de Queretaro, Angel Sepulveda (Queretaro) misses the target with a header.
In the minute 29, Ball goes out of play for a America goal kick.
Free kick for Queretaro in their own half.
Kevin Ramirez of Queretaro smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 32, America awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to America.
Hugo Silveira is on target to give Queretaro a 1-0 advantage.
In the minute 35, Irving Zurita instrumental with a fine assist.
Queretaro have been awarded a corner by Diego Montano Robles.
Throw-in America.
In the minute 38, Queretaro awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Diego Montano Robles signals a free kick to America in their own half.
Queretaro awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 39, In Santiago de Queretaro America drive forward through Sebastian Cordova. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Corner awarded to America.
America drives forward and Leonardo Suarez gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 40, Free kick for America in their own half.
Irving Zurita (Queretaro) gets a yellow card.
Richard Sanchez (America) has been booked for the second time by the referee and is off!
In the minute 42, Leonardo Suarez for America drives towards goal at Estadio La Corregidora. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Queretaro are pushing forward but Angel Sepulveda's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Santiago de Queretaro.
In the minute 45, In Santiago de Queretaro, Queretaro push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Diego Montano Robles signals a free kick to Queretaro in their own half.
The 1st half is prolonged by 1 minutes of added time.
In the minute 45, Goal kick for America at Estadio La Corregidora.
Diego Montano Robles signals a free kick to America.
Ball safe as Queretaro is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 45, The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
The second half has started at Estadio La Corregidora.
America awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 46, America make their second substitution with Henry Martin replacing Luis Reyes.
Emilio Sanchez is replacing Leonardo Suarez for America at Estadio La Corregidora.
In the minute 47, Free kick for Queretaro in their own half.
Alex Diego is making the team's first substitution at Estadio La Corregidora with Sebastian Sosa replacing Angel Sepulveda.
America have been awarded a corner by Diego Montano Robles.
America's Emilio Sanchez gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 50, It's a goal kick for the home team in Santiago de Queretaro.
The home team have replaced Irving Zurita with Omar Islas. This is the second substitution made today by Alex Diego.
Diego Montano Robles awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 51, Throw-in for Queretaro in their own half.
Diego Montano Robles signals a throw-in for America, close to Queretaro's area.
Free kick for America in their own half.
In the minute 55, Throw-in for America in the half of Queretaro.
Free kick America.
Throw-in for Queretaro at Estadio La Corregidora.
In the minute 57, Goal kick for America at Estadio La Corregidora.
Federico Vinas levels the score at 1-1.
Throw-in America.
In the minute 60, Free kick for Queretaro in the half of America.
Goal! Queretaro have got their heads in front thanks to a Daniel Cervantes strike.
That's a fine assist from Omar Islas.
In the minute 62, Corner awarded to America.
Diego Montano Robles signals a America throw-in in Queretaro's half.
Diego Montano Robles awards Queretaro a goal kick.
In the minute 64, Diego Montano Robles signals a free kick to Queretaro in their own half.
Sebastian Sosa (Queretaro) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Ball goes out of play for a America goal kick.
In the minute 65, Queretaro needs to be cautious. America have an attacking throw-in.
Emilio Sanchez (America) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
America have been awarded a corner by Diego Montano Robles.
In the minute 66, Diego Montano Robles awards the home team a throw-in.
Queretaro take a comfortable 3-1 lead thanks to Omar Islas.
Great play from Hugo Silveira to set up the goal.
Throw-in for America at Estadio La Corregidora.
In the minute 68, Ramon Juarez is replacing Sebastian Caceres for the away team.
Can Queretaro capitalize from this throw-in deep inside America's half?
In the minute 70, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In Santiago de Queretaro a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Queretaro awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 72, Free kick for America in their own half.
Can America get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Queretaro's half?
Ball safe as Queretaro is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 73, Queretaro to take a throw-in in America territory.
Queretaro have a dangerous throw-in.
America awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 75, Queretaro have a goal kick.
Queretaro's Fernando Madrigal breaks free at Estadio La Corregidora. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a America goal kick.
In the minute 76, Gonzalo Montes of Queretaro gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Santiago de Queretaro.
Federico Vinas gets his shot on target but fails to score for America.
In the minute 77, Throw-in for Queretaro close to the penalty box.
Diego Montano Robles signals a free kick to America in their own half.
Sebastian Sosa (Queretaro) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 78, Miguel Herrera (America) is making a fourth substitution, with Sergio Diaz replacing Roger Martinez.
Free kick for America in the half of Queretaro.
Santiago Caseres for America drives towards goal at Estadio La Corregidora. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 80, Corner awarded to America.
Queretaro awarded a free kick in their own half.
Sebastian Cordova for America has been booked by Diego Montano Robles and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 81, In Santiago de Queretaro, Sebastian Sosa (Queretaro) gets his head to the ball but the strike is cleared by an untiring defence.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Diego Montano Robles signals a throw-in for Queretaro, close to America's area.
In the minute 82, Diego Montano Robles signals a free kick to America in their own half.
Throw-in for Queretaro in their own half.
The home team have replaced Sebastian Sosa with Jonathan Betancourt. This is the third substitution made today by Alex Diego.
In the minute 84, Throw-in Queretaro.
Can America capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
America have a goal kick.
In the minute 86, Diego Montano Robles awards Queretaro a goal kick.
Free kick for America in their own half.
Federico Vinas (America) gets in a powerful header but the ball is cleared away.
Queretaro's Hugo Silveira is on target but unsuccessful.
Queretaro are coming forward and Hugo Silveira gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for America at Estadio La Corregidora.
3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Free kick Queretaro.
Queretaro have been awarded a corner by Diego Montano Robles.
America's Federico Vinas gets in a shot on goal at Estadio La Corregidora. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Diego Montano Robles blows to end the match. The final score is 4-1.
The home team replace Fernando Madrigal with Kevin Escamilla.
Goal! Queretaro extend their lead to 4-1 through Hugo Silveira.
